description.ko: 다크 미니멀리즘과 혼란스러운 디지털 왜곡의 세련된 조화로, 활기찬 네온 액센트와 함께 하이테크 빈 공간에서 부서지는 날카로운 기하학적 형상을 보여줍니다.
description.en: A sleek fusion of dark minimalism and chaotic digital distortion, featuring sharp geometric shapes fracturing across a high-tech void with vibrant neon accents.

prompt: Abstract digital art of KURO-X logo integrated with sharp geometric shapes, fragmented polygons, and digital glitch artifacts. Dark obsidian background with vibrant neon cyan and electric magenta chromatic aberration. High contrast, sharp edges, vector-style 3D cubes breaking apart, scanlines, pixel sorting effects, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution, tech-noir aesthetic.
